name: Riita
description:
Delay the Day or Welcome the Night

Join a real time battle between two ancient enemies in this Kalevala inspired rhythm game!

Choose your side

Recruit villagers to strengthen your spells, and play tunes on your zither to keep the celestial body of your choice up in the sky. Can you delay the inevitable cycle of day and night for just a little longer?

Features
  • Real time battle: score points for your own side to win
  • Rhythm Games: become a kantele hero using your keyboard
  • Charming Music: discover 10+ unique songs!
  • Recruit villagers: help your people to earn their loyalty
  • Cat: It’s loafing!
